feature_model.name: FeatureIDE model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r GameOfLife(GameOfLife) :o Composed(Composed) :g [1,*] : UndoRedoGenerator(UndoRedoGenerator) : UndoRedoTest(UndoRedoTest) : UndoRedoGuiBase(UndoRedoGuiBase) :o Options(Options) :o UndoRedo(UndoRedo) :o Test(Test) :m Generator(Generator) :o GeneratorSelection(GeneratorSelection) :m DefaultGenerator(DefaultGenerator) :g [1,1] : RandomDefaultGenerator(RandomDefaultGenerator) : FormDefaultGenerator(FormDefaultGenerator) :m ConcretGenerator(ConcretGenerator) :g [1,*] : RandomGenerator(RandomGenerator) : FormGenerator(FormGenerator) :m AbstractGenerator(AbstractGenerator) :o IO(IO) :o PopUpMenu(PopUpMenu) :m View(View) :g [1,*] : GuiBase(GuiBase) :m Model(Model) :g [1,*] : ModelBase(ModelBase)
feature_model.constraints:
C1:~UndoRedo or ~AbstractGenerator or UndoRedoGenerator C2:UndoRedo or ~UndoRedoGenerator C3:AbstractGenerator or ~UndoRedoGenerator
C4:~UndoRedo or ~Test or UndoRedoTest C5:UndoRedo or ~UndoRedoTest C6:Test or ~UndoRedoTest
C7:~UndoRedo or UndoRedoGuiBase C8:~UndoRedoGuiBase or UndoRedo C9:~UndoRedoGuiBase or GuiBase
C10:~RandomGenerator or ~FormGenerator or GeneratorSelection C11:RandomGenerator or ~GeneratorSelection C12:FormGenerator or ~GeneratorSelection
C13:~RandomGenerator or FormGenerator or RandomDefaultGenerator C14:~FormGenerator or RandomGenerator or FormDefaultGenerator
C15:~FormGenerator or ~RandomGenerator or FormDefaultGenerator or RandomDefaultGenerator
C16:~GeneratorSelection or GuiBase
